entities.name: RowType
entities.description: A type definition for an array of objects with string keys and any type values.

entities.name: database
entities.description: Represents a database instance or connection.

entities.name: TableName
entities.description: A type definition representing the name of a table within a database.

entities.name: TableSchema
entities.description: A type definition for the schema of a database table, specifying the structure of columns.

entities.name: table
entities.description: Represents a specific table within a database, used for various table operations.

relationships.description: The database instance queries and returns data of type RowType.
The database instance uses TableName for specifying table names in operations.
The database instance defines TableSchema for creating or manipulating table schemas.
The database instance performs various manipulations on the table object, including create, drop, truncate, rename, and data operations.
